sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Change label of extension element from completed to allocated</description>
        <name>change label of extension  to allocated</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var choice = new GlideRecord("sys_choice");
choice.addQuery("name", "resource_plan");
choice.addQuery("element", "extension");
choice.addQuery("language", "en");
choice.query();
while (choice.next()) {
	if(choice.getValue('value') == 'completed'){
		choice.setValue('label', 'Allocated');
		choice.update();
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-10-10 11:15:52</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>aff3d6df731000104072472a27f6a7b6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>change label of extension  to allocated</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Resource Management" source="com.snc.resource_management">7200da2b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d438e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_aff3d6df731000104072472a27f6a7b6</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-10-10 17:09:57</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: change label of extension to allocated
